alert.note: Alert for Redwood; Renville (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 05 at 9:37PM CDT until May 12 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... Minnesota River at Savage affecting Scott, Carver, Dakota and Hennepin Counties. Minnesota River at Granite Falls HWY 212 affecting Yellow Medicine, Renville and Chippewa Counties. Minnesota River at Montevideo affecting Yellow Medicine, Lac qui Parle and Chippewa Counties. Minnesota River at Morton affecting Redwood and Renville Counties. .Showers and thunderstorms have produced a decent amount of rainfall in spots today, however not widespread enough to cause any issues with our downwards trend in river levels. We expect to continue to see a downward trend despite further showers through the weekend. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Minnesota River at Morton. * WHEN...Until early Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet, Riverside Rd and Front Street flooded in North Redwood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 900 PM CDT Friday, the stage was 21.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 900 PM CDT Friday was 21.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 21.9 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 21.9 feet on 04/04/2007. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
